name: 曾釋鋒
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹製造流程編排、可程式控制系統、資料傳輸及局部迴路系統、數值控制、數值控制編程、工業機器人、人工智慧、整合製造系統（CIM）。
Manufacturing Process Planning, Programmable Control System, Data-Communication and Local-Area-Network System, Numerical Control, Programming for NC Machining, Industrial Robot, Artificial Intelligence, and Computer Integrated Manufacturing System.
